body.name: Lucid California King Bedframe with Vertical Channeled Headboard — Upholstered Platform Bed — Easy Assembly — California King Size — No Box Spring Needed — Stone Color
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 14 hrs 21 mins
features: STYLISH DESIGN – The light gray headboard comes with vertical lines, providing stylish channels with padded foam and polyester for a cushioned texture to any Cal King bed frame.
COMPATIBLE WITH MOST ADJUSTABLE BASES – The wooden removable slats make this Cal King-size bed frame compatible with traditional and zero-clearance adjustable bed frame
MADE TO LAST – The Cal King bedframe has high-quality construction, with a 600-pound weight limit, making it a durable and long-lasting addition to your Cal King bed

EASY ASSEMBLY – Only seven steps to assemble with included screws, bolts, pre-drilled holes, and a metal support bar for larger size frames. Phillips-Head screwdriver needed for assembly is not included.
CARE INSTRUCTIONS – Keep this bed frame unblemished with mild detergent and a damp cloth for a simple and easy spot clean for your bed; comes with a limited 2-year warranty.
body.description: At Lucid, we make beds for the whole family— because when you create your own space, your room becomes a part of your identity. The Lucid Stone Upholstered Bed Frame with Vertical Channeled Headboard is a great modern focal point. Add this contemporary piece to any Cal King bed frame. The light gray fabric is upholstered with polyester, bringing texture to any bedroom. The vertical channeled headboard perfectly matches the upholstered side rails. Wooden slats eliminate the need for a box spring and provide reliable support for your mattress. Clear your room of clutter with a bed frame that provides easy under-bed storage space. This product ships directly from our home to yours in one easy-to-carry box. Style awaits.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This platform bed is easy to assemble in the comfort of your home. Conveniently ships directly to your door in one easy-to-carry box. Choose from four neutral colors to complement your bedroom: Black, Charcoal, Pearl, or Stone.

Lucid Upholstered Bed with Channel Tufted Headboard Lucid Upholstered Bed with Diamond Tufted Headboard Mattress Compatibility Use with foam, latex, or spring mattress Use with foam, latex, or spring mattress Platform Height in Inches 14 14 Adjustable Base Compatibility Traditional and Zero Clearance Traditional and Zero Clearance Color Black, charcoal, pearl, stone Black, charcoal, pearl, stone Headboard Channel-tufted Diamond-tufted Box Spring Required Not Required Not Required

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to put together
reviews.reviewText: For someone who is not handy at all and does not even own a screw driver this bed was easy to assemble on my own (took me about 1.5 hours). The bed showed up very quick. The box was ripped open when it showed up at my door so I was a little nervous there would be some damage to the actual bed but there really wasn’t. One piece of the foot end of the frame has a rip but it’s on the underside and doesn’t bother me. Overall nice bed. Feels sturdy. Good for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great with adjustable bed
reviews.reviewText: We purchased the California King in Pearl. I wanted something to give a finished look to our adjustable bed frame and mattress and this worked perfect! We just omitted the slats and the cross rails. It was straight forward to put together. Certainly meets our purposes at a great price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really nice bed frame, but a tad bit on the flimsy side
reviews.reviewText: Love: DesignNot so love: QualityMy boys ran through this bed within 4 months. The woods on the railing weren’t aligned with the screw holes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This is the crappiest piece of junk it has ever been my misfortune to buy.
reviews.reviewText: The bed is poorly manufactured. One leg of the headboard tilts inward and caused it to be difficult or impossible to make screw holes meet when there were any to meet. We had to buy extra washers and a drill bit to drill a hole to make it work at all. The footboard legs are plastic junk. The wood slats are rough wood-get a bunkie board or box spring or they will rip up your mattress...wear gloves when assembling or they will cut your hands. Some slats were just shy of too long to reach side to side and some barely made it...one did not completely cover the support on the side rail so could not be appropriately screwed into place. In many places, the wood is scored or marked looking almost as if the wood was going to split in those spots. The bed frame (full size) appears to actually be larger than a full size as one can see in pictures provided that the mattress (full size) does not fill the box frame. Absolute waste of money. I'd return it--if it wouldn't cost me more time, energy, and effort to take the whole thing apart and re-pack all the parts and ship back to the seller, which I imagine they count on. NEVER again will I buy a bed online! Absolutely disgusted with the complete lack of quality.

reviews.reviewerName: Templeton Real Estate Group HOME STAGINGTempleton Real Estate Group HOME STAGING
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great at an affordable price
reviews.reviewText: I was trying to replicate a designer look that included a very expensive black bed, this was the perfect compromise! It is sturdy and looks great. The only thing to be aware of is that the mattress sits on top of the frame, so you really should get a 12 inch mattress max if you want the more modern lower profile look. My mattress is 14 inches and I really would've preferred the 10 or 12 inch. Also I like to tuck bedding and the mattress sitting right ton top makes it a bitter harder. It took my husband about an hour to put it together. Its perfect for the look I was trying to create in our little beach bungalow for a very affordable price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Instructions are awful!
reviews.reviewText: It’s a beautiful bed, love the color & how sturdy it feels. However, it was awful putting it together! My husband said the instructions were terrible & they need to have a handyman write better ones. He also said don’t be worried you’re missing piece G-it’s probably wrapped with the other wooden slats.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing bedframe & Outstanding customer service
reviews.reviewText: I just had to have this beautiful platform bedframe! I will start by saying we did initally have an issue (we were accidentally sent a returned bed - missing 1 leg, bolts, a slat and instructions). HOWEVER, we were provided with OUTSTANDING customer service to quickly remedy the issues. This bedframe is gorgeous with a very modern upscale look. It's a little low to the floor but that's what I needed with my back issues. We did not use a boxspring but you could. It's sturdy and even with the obstacles we had, it wasn't terrible to put together it just took a little out-of-the-box creativity. All in all, we are very happy customers, love the bedframe and recommend both this product and the seller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars If it wasn’t defective… yeah
reviews.reviewText: I must’ve received one that skipped Quality Control. Ordered King size and the support bars were bent and did not line up to headboard footboard. This caused the bed to be slightly kiltered, Smdh. Thinking I’ve already got a whole bed delivered and out of the box let me keep going. The wood slats were crooked due to support bar being bent. Also several of the slats did not have holes for screws or they were slightly short so if you did screw a nail if would not be screwed into anything 😑😑😑… Also some of the bigger Hex screws for the slats did not line up at all… no where close. In certain areas bed Is creaky and unstable. Super disappointed after all the reviews bc I think it would be great if the pieces were correct. Tried to contact Amazon to no avail… talking about sending a return but I have to mail this raggedy one back. Now who is attempting to ReBOX something this large from warehouse and then lug it down three flights of stairs and into my little hatchback car?! Seriously …

Was surprised at the quality of this bed. Was o my for the cottage but its sturdier than our King bed at home.Good instructions, good quality, real steel supports with adjustable feet.Really impressed as it was about half the cost of other cheaper beds i looked at.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very sturdy and fits the mattress perfectly
reviews.reviewText: Love this bed frame, it looks great and fits the Amazon mattress perfectly.

reviews.reviewTitle: Comfortable and chic overall fantastic frame for Twin XL
reviews.reviewText: Clean, sleek frame, the upholstered headboard is surprisingly soft and plushy! Deducted one star, as the only part I disliked is the plastic construction of the mid frame supports and legs. Most other brands at this price point provide metal or rubberwood legs which are more solid in feel and structure. But can't complain much since there are few frames on the market for TWIN XL mattresses. Slats are solid wood, thick and sturdy. Channel tufting and neutral color will suit nearly any decor scheme!

Stick to Zinus, cost less and way better quality.If using this with the Lucid adjustable base it is flimsy especially the sides that have no side support, side do not stay straight, bends at the middle legs. Headboard is also very flimsy and bends back and forth very easily, won’t be able to rest against it unless it is flush with the wall.

reviews.reviewTitle: When we built it. The piece under headboard was too small.
